about_the_game: Boasting over 2 hours of music spread across 51 tracks, the Bygone Dreams Original Soundtrack captures the sense of awe and beauty found throughout the game's iconic dream world. From the melancholic garden to the action-packed depths of the nightmare, all tracks were composed and recorded specifically for the game, sure to find a home in every game OST connoisseur's playlist.
detailed_description: Boasting over 2 hours of music spread across 51 tracks, the Bygone Dreams Original Soundtrack captures the sense of awe and beauty found throughout the game's iconic dream world. From the melancholic garden to the action-packed depths of the nightmare, all tracks were composed and recorded specifically for the game, sure to find a home in every game OST connoisseur's playlist.

name: Bygone Dreams Original Soundtrack

Minimum:
  • Storage: 415 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1270 MB available space
